Uses of Interface
moulton.scalable.draggables.ScrollableComponent

Packages that use ScrollableComponent
Package Description
moulton.scalable.containers
The containers package contains classes that are intended for holding menu components, especially panel classes which serve as nodes in the menu rendering tree structure.
moulton.scalable.texts
The texts package contains classes and menu components that ar primarily dedicated to holding and processing text for display in the menu.

  • Uses of ScrollableComponent in moulton.scalable.containers

    Classes in moulton.scalable.containers that implement ScrollableComponent
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ListPanel
    A subclass of VirtualPanel.
    class  VirtualPanel
    An improved Panel class that can be scrolled and can thus hold hidden elements in "virtual space".

  • Uses of ScrollableComponent in moulton.scalable.texts

    Classes in moulton.scalable.texts that implement ScrollableComponent
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  StaticTextBox
    In some instances, the user will find it useful to select and/or copy text from a text box, but should not be able to edit its values.
    class  TextBox
    This is a text box that users can enter data into, the available characters for which is defined by TextFormat.
    class  TextHistory
    A menu component that holds a history of text.
